page.title: 10The Brass Band - Kirton
page.content: On the Wednesday night when I first joined Kirton Band we all squeezed into the bandroom at the back of the 'Stag and Pheasant' Public House car park.During the evening they took our names and any important imformation such as any previous musical knowledge.Later we were given our instruments and I received a large one called a Euphonium. I tried to blow my Euphonium and I got a horrible noise!I took it home that evening and as I practised that week the noise grew better.The next band evening we started blowing notes and from then we have progressed to our present standard. Now there are sixteen junior band members and ten adult bandsmen.The older members are very patient and helpful;they have to be for most of the time somebody has a sticky valve!
